titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1054) to amend chapter 171 of title 28, United States Code, to allow members of the Armed Forces to sue the United States for damages for certain injuries caused by improper medical care.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-505.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1054 (tort claims by armed forces members for injuries caused by medical care).
